transcript.text: good morning Shalom this is the third
day of aw the third day of the seventh
Hebrew month third day after Yom to Rua
and for those who know me my close
friends they know that I am NOT an early
morning person I'm a I'm a night owl but
before I start my work day today I I
wanted it to make a podcasts early this
morning because ya just showed me
something amazing about spiritual
warfare
so yesterday a sister had contacted me
and said that she had had some real bad
dreams night before and so I told her I
said look you need to read and pray over
Psalm 121 before you go to bed every
night to prevent any bad dreams from
bothering your sleep and the reason I
told that tour is because the day before
on yom teruah we had a gathering of
believers a brother had shared that he
and his wife every night before they go
to bed they would pray and meditate over
Psalm 121 and they would do this
faithfully so I told her that and she
said she would
and so then last night I thought you
know I'm gonna do that too you know I
don't really have problems with bad
dreams but I thought I'm gonna do that
too so I prayed and meditated over Psalm
121 I was really tired last night and so
I went to bed early like I don't I
normally stay up pretty late cuz I'm a
night owl but I went to bed at like
10:30 at night which is early for me and
and then about four or five o'clock in
the morning this very gross just vile
sick dream was in my mind and all of a
sudden yah told me what to do and I took
authority over this devil that was
trying to oppress me and I put it into
everlasting chains reserved into
everlasting darkness until the day of
judgment I did that through the
authority and power that Yahshua is
given me and immediately the the dream
and the vision was gone and for many
months something since like last fall
I've had this pain in my right leg my
right foot it's been a bad pain and
immediately that pain just just jumped
off of me
it was
on and it's been with me for months and
I was just rejoicing because I was
reminded of the verse where it says
where Paul says every vain imagination
that exalts itself so against ya you
just supposed to rip down and tear down
and and I was like hallelujah
so Yahshua gave me this authority to do
spiritual warfare and and so I wanted to
share this with you so that you can do
this as well that this is a technique
that you can do and after I had done
that I yo had me just speak out a
proclamation and I said any devil any
fallen angel any wicked entity that
tries to come against me just be put on
notice that through the power of yah he
threw me will cause you to go into
everlasting darkness and I put that
warning out also for any Devils that
would mess with my friends and so I put
that Proclamation out you know because
it you know it says Michael the
Archangel said that he doesn't even
rebuke Satan but he says yah rebuke you
so I wanted to make sure that this is
not me but this is yah
Yas dealing with it and taking care of
it and so he works through me
but as Yahshua told us I rejoice not
that I can trample the devil's underfoot
the scorpions and the adders and the and
the Cobra but rather that my name is
written in the Lamb's Book of Life
hallelujah so good morning third day of
Oz we're getting closer to Yom Kippur
and the website is WWE 2k I gotta get
ready for work god bless Shalom
